metadata.user-script:
#!/bin/bash

exists() {
  if command -v $1 &>/dev/null
  then
    return 0
  else
    return 1
  fi
}

if ! exists /opt/local/bin/chef-client; then
  pkgin -y install gcc47 gcc47-runtime scmgit-base scmgit-docs gmake ruby193-base ruby193-yajl ruby193-nokogiri ruby193-readline pkg-config

  ## for smf cookbook
  pkgin -y install libxslt

  ## install chef
  gem update --system
  gem install --no-ri --no-rdoc ohai
  gem install --no-ri --no-rdoc json
  gem install --no-ri --no-rdoc chef --version=10.20.0
  gem install --no-ri --no-rdoc rb-readline
fi

mkdir -p /etc/chef /var/log/chef
